note.title: Meet Masinissa
note.text: Make your way to Masinissa's camp alone and talk to him.

note.title: Scipio must survive
note.text: Scipio must survive in order for Hannibal to be defeated.

note.title: Landing site
note.text: The Iberian reinforcements are likely to come ashore here.

note.title: Iberian reinforcements
note.text: Intercept the Iberian reinforcements before they reach the Numidian camp.

note.title: Return to Masinissa
note.text: Return to Masinissa and convince him to join you.

note.title: City of Utica
note.text: You should strengthen your army: the city of Utica, not far away from here, can be a good option. It is said to be impregnable to the enemy attacks... as long as it is supplied with food.

note.title: Kill Syphax
note.text: The Numidian king Syphax has allied with Hannibal. If you kill him, his troops will join yours unless Masinissa is killed.

note.title: Zama
note.text: Defeat Hannibal and destroy his entire army at Zama.
